sections.title: What type of business do you want to register?

fields.label: What type of business do you want to register?

sections.title: What is your role in the business?
You cannot register the business for Fuel Duty

fields.label: cannotReg
fields.infoText: This is because you the business has not authorised you to register it for Fuel Duty.

sections.title: Enter the business' Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number

fields.label: Enter the business' Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number
fields.helpText: This is 2 letters and then 15 numbers. The 2 letters must be the country code. For example 'GB'

fields.label: Find an EORI country code
fields.infoText:
Code and Country:

**United Kingdom - GB**

Austria - AT

Belgium - BE 

Bulgaria - BG

Croatia - HR

Cyprus - CY

Czechia - CZ 

Denmark - DK 

Estonia - EE

Finland - FI 

France - FR

Germany - DE

Greece - EL

Hungary - HU

Ireland - IE

Italy - IT

Latvia - LV

Lithuania - LT

Luxembourg - LU

Malta - MT

Netherlands - NL

Poland - PL

Portugal - PT

Romania - RO

Slovakia - SK 

Slovenia - SL 

Sweden - SE 

United Kingdom - GB

sections.title: You cannot register the business for Fuel Duty

fields.label: cannotReg
fields.infoText:
This is because you need to enter the business' Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number.

You'll need to sign out, or save your progress and come back when you have the number. 

If you do not have an EORI number you'll need to go to GOV.UK to apply for one (https://www.gov.uk/eori).

fields.label: Trading name (optional)
fields.helpText: Enter the trading name if it's different from the business name

sections.title: Enter the principal place of business details

fields.infoText: We'll only use this address if we need to contact the business to discuss this form. You can choose to enter a different address for correspondence.

fields.label: Do you want to add a correspondence address that's different to the above address?

fields.infoText: We will use these details if we need to contact the business to discuss this form.

sections.title: Enter the date you expect the business to start owing fuel duty
sections.shortName: Details of first fuel duty liability

sections.title: You'll need to complete a different form

fields.infoText:
##If you require a guarantor
You must complete the Guarantee deferment of payment to HMRC (C1201) form.

##If you are not required to have a guarantor
You must complete the SIVA2 form and EPSS letter.

fields.label: contDet
fields.infoText: We will use these details to contact you if we need to discuss this form.

declarationSection.title: Submit form to register the business for Fuel Duty

fields.infoText: By submitting this form you are confirming that all the information you’ve provided is correct and complete.

This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF of the form you submitted.

##If you require a guarantor
You’ll need to complete the Guarantee deferment of payment to HMRC (C1201) form.

##If you are not required to have a guarantor
You’ll need to complete the SIVA2 and EPSS letter

##If you need a bank guarantee for oils
You’ll need to complete the Guarantee for payment of sums due to the Commissioners of HMRC (C1201HO) form.

##If you need to set up a direct debit mandate
You’ll need to complete the Duty deferment instructions to pay by Direct Debit (C1202) form.
